Question & Options:

Which of the following statements are true regarding the characters in the movie 'Lakshmi'?
Options:
A. Asif allowed Laxman Sharma alias Laxmii to possess him for revenge.
B. Laxmii adopted Geeta and worked hard to support her.
C. Geeta played a significant role in Laxmii's story.
D. Asif and Laxmii had a complex relationship.
Correct Answer: a) Asif allowed Laxman Sharma alias Laxmii to possess him for revenge. and b) Laxmii adopted Geeta and worked hard to support her.
